name: RAGÚDinnerConversations
0:
”Alexa, open RAGU Dinner Conversations”
”What should we talk about?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ragu dinner conversations
Developer Terms of Use
des: Let Alexa help you spark some dinnertime conversations. Get fun, interesting questions and suggestions that will have everyone at the table talking and connecting. (When they're not eating all the delicious food you made, that is.) Just open the skill and ask “what should we talk about?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
